org.logevents.formatting

Class ConsoleLogEventFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.logevents.formatting.ConsoleLogEventFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Function<LogEvent,java.lang.String>, LogEventFormatter

    public class ConsoleLogEventFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogEventFormatter
    A simple formatter used by ConsoleLogEventObserver by default. Suitable for overriding apply(LogEvent) Example configuration 
     observer.foo.includedMdcKeys=clientIp
 observer.*.packageFilter=sun.www, com.example.uninteresting
    Author:
    Johannes Brodwall
